statements: SELECT * FROM arbitrage_trading;
SELECT exchange_name, buy_price FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE sell_price > buy_price;
SELECT asset_name, sell_price FROM arbitrage_trading ORDER BY sell_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance';
SELECT id, asset_name, buy_price FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE buy_price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE buy_price > 100 AND sell_price < 200;
SELECT id, exchange_name, asset_name FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE buy_price < 150 ORDER BY sell_price DESC;
SELECT asset_name, exchange_name, buy_price, sell_price FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE buy_price < 120 OR exchange_name = 'Binance' ORDER BY buy_price ASC, sell_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE exchange_name IN ('Binance', 'Kraken') AND sell_price - buy_price > 50 ORDER BY exchange_name, asset_name;
SELECT DISTINCT exchange_name FROM arbitrage_trading WHERE buy_price > sell_price ORDER BY exchange_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Exchange WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM Exchange ORDER BY exchange_name DESC;
SELECT trade_id, asset_name, price FROM Trade WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Trade WHERE asset_name = 'Bitcoin' AND quantity >= 5;
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM Exchange WHERE exchange_name LIKE '%Stock%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Exchange WHERE id = 1;
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM Exchange WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Trade WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT asset_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Trade GROUP BY asset_name HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT Exchange.exchange_name, Trade.asset_name, Trade.quantity * Trade.price AS total_value FROM Exchange JOIN Trade ON Exchange.id = Trade.exchange_id;
SELECT * FROM exchanges;
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM exchanges ORDER BY exchange_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, price FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY executed_at ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type FROM trades WHERE exchange_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM exchanges;
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM exchanges ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, price FROM assets WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, quantity FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'buy' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE executed_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ArbitrageExchange;
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM ArbitrageExchange WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT exchange_name, timestamp FROM ArbitrageExchange ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT currency_pair, buy_price, sell_price FROM ExchangePrices WHERE buy_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ArbitrageOpportunities WHERE feasible = TRUE ORDER BY profit_margin DESC;
SELECT * FROM ArbitrageExchange;
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM ArbitrageExchange WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT exchange_name, location, timestamp FROM ArbitrageExchange ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT e.exchange_name, p.currency_pair, p.buy_price, p.sell_price FROM ExchangePrices p JOIN ArbitrageExchange e ON p.exchange_id = e.id;
SELECT o.currency_pair, o.profit_margin, t.trade_type, t.trade_amount FROM ArbitrageOpportunities o JOIN Trades t ON o.id = t.opportunity_id WHERE t.trade_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM exchange_1;
SELECT exchange_name, price FROM exchange_2 WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT pair, action, quantity FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM user_accounts;
SELECT pair, exchange_1_price, exchange_2_price, potential_profit FROM arbitrage_opportunities WHERE potential_profit > 1000 ORDER BY potential_profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchange_1;
SELECT exchange_name, pair, price FROM exchange_2 WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT trade_timestamp, pair, action, quantity, price FROM trade_history WHERE action = 'BUY' AND quantity >= 10;
SELECT id, username, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT pair, exchange_1_price, exchange_2_price, potential_profit FROM arbitrage_opportunities WHERE potential_profit > 100 ORDER BY potential_profit DESC;
